job.title: Data Scientist
job.description: stronguCompany OverviewbrbrustrongWarnerMedia is a powerful portfolio of iconic entertainment news and sports brands We bring people technology and the worlds best storytellers together to drive culture and meaningful connection We believe the enduring power of stories can open our eyes to the world to each other and to new and different perspectivesbrbrJoin us Shape your story herebrbrstrongThe PerksbrstrongulliExclusive WarnerMedia events and advance screeningsliliPaid time off every year to volunteer for eligible employeesliliAccess to wellbeing tools resources and freebiesliliAccess to inhouse learning and development resourcesliliPart of the WarnerMedia family of powerhouse brandsbrliulWarner Media LLC and its subsidiaries are equal opportunity employers Qualified candidates will receive consideration for employment without regard to race color religion national origin gender sexual orientation gender identity or expression age mental or physical disability and genetic information marital status citizenship status military status protected veteran status or any other category protected by law
